name: Leandro Lopes
description:
'''Leandro Lopes Luiz''' (born January 24, 1984), best known as '''Leandro Lopes''', is a [[Brazil]]ian pop rock and [[axé music]] singer and songwriter.

He rose to fame after winning the [[Ídolos Brazil (season 1)|first season]] of the [[Reality television|reality television show]] ''Ídolos Brazil''.
